availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Smiley Stewart (Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarilda Cain Stewart. Father of James H. Stewart, Lavinia Stewart, Araminta Stewart, Oliver Perry Stewart, Thomas M. Stewart, Cynthia B. Stewart, and George S. Stewart. Farmer in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 64A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 505.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Precinct 1, p. 191A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lawrence County, KY, October 1863, p. 145.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2987.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Lawrence County Administrators Bonds, 1865-1914, p. 81.
KYR-0001-004-3393.
